extends androidx.lifecycle.AndroidViewModel

                                 java.lang.String resourceName,
                                 @Nullable
                                 CodeEntity code)
        Sets the code associated with the Button
        Parameters:
        resourceName - the resource name of the button (e.g. tk.michaelmckey.microcontrollerremote:id/button_ok)
        code - the Code to associate with the Button (if it is null it just removes the reference)
